forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 18. Northwest wind 6 to 13 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 31. Northwest wind around 15 mph.

weather_report:
As evening settles over Boston, a veil of clouds drapes the city, softening the sharp edges of its skyline under the muted glow of artificial lights. The chill in the air, tracing the contours of the architecture, hints at winter’s tenacity. Temperatures will dip to around 18 degrees, although the promise of a bright Friday looms just over the horizon. In the morning, the sun will make a valiant entrance, illuminating the day with a touch of warmth, peaking at approximately 31 degrees. A brisk northwest wind will accompany this transition, adding a lively rush that beckons one to dress warmly yet stylishly—layers of wool and a sturdy coat will serve well, perhaps a scarf to fend off the evening's bite.

Amid the looming clouds, tonight’s ambiance pulses with the solitude of a quiet city, whispering invitations to savor ordinary pleasures—a walk along the waterfront, perhaps, or enjoying the hushed atmosphere of a cozy café. Tomorrow, as the sun spills over the horizon, your activities might lean towards clearer pursuits: a leisurely stroll through a park enjoying the sun's nurturing embrace or gathering with friends for a casual brunch, savoring the brightness of a new day. Even as winter holds its grip, there is a gentle promise of cheer in the air, an anticipation of warmth and light, waiting just around the corner.
